name: CUBE Star King Poping
description:
CUBE Star King Poping is an amazing pop match - 3 puzzle game for kids and toddler! have a toy story in toys games , dot make bird angry
How to Play:
* Complete the level target and win.
* Just tap two or more blocks of the same color pop star on board.
* The more blocks you pop, the more score you will get in Pop Legend
* Beat a level with fewer moves, and you'll get a higher score.
Free Addictive
- easy and intuitive controls
- beautiful graphics and calm music
- Enjoy loads of whacky and challenging levels
- No time pressure or any rush - experience hours of endless fun
